author: Laura Stevens
title: Amazon Earnings: What to Watch
text:
Amazon.com Inc. is scheduled to announce its fourth-quarter earnings after the market closes Thursday. Hereâ€™s what you need to know:
EARNINGS FORECAST: Analysts polled by Thomson Reuters expect Amazon to earn $1.85 a share, compared with $1.54 a year ago. The company has forecast an operating income range between $300 million and $1.65 billion, compared with income of $1.26 billion a year ago.
